title: Ebert & Roeper - 04.20.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  April 20th, 2008 -  with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0411061/]88 Minutes[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0815178/]The Life Before Her Eyes[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0800039/]Forgetting Sarah Marshall[/url] (first reviewed on 4.6.08)
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0865556/]The Forbidden Kingdom[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0963208/]Where in the World Is Osama Bin Laden?[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0857191/]The Visitor[/url]

--- Next Week
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0371746/]Iron Man[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0481536/]Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0871426/]Baby Mama[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0411061/]88 Minutes[/url]  -  (way) down - (way) down
-- Al Pacino

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0815178/]The Life Before Her Eyes[/url]  -  down - up
-- directed by Vadim Perelman - ( House of Sand and Fog )
-- Uma Thurman - Evan Rachel Wood - Eva Amurri

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0800039/]Forgetting Sarah Marshall[/url]  -  UP - UP
-- Jason Segel - Kristen Bell - Russell Brand - Jonah Hill - Mila Kunis - Paul Rudd - Bill Hader

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0865556/]The Forbidden Kingdom[/url]  - (pretty sharp) up - (liked it a lot) up
-- Jackie Chan - Jet Li - Michael Angarano

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0963208/]Where in the World Is Osama Bin Laden?[/url]  -  (way) down - (way) down
-- documentary

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0857191/]The Visitor[/url]  -  (way) up - (way) up
-- Richard Jenkins - Haaz Sleiman - Danai Jekesai Gurira

	---Thumbs Up Video
		--Phillips:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0775529/]The Savages[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Savages-Phillip-Seymour-Hoffman/dp/B0014GI6I2/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1208825220&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
		--Roeper:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0472062/]Charlie Wilson&#039;s War[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Charlie-Wilsons-War-Widescreen-Hanks/dp/B0013XZ2QK/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1208825145&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0758745/]Friday Night Lights[/url] The Second Season (TV)  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Friday-Night-Lights-Second-Season/dp/B0014DO5XU/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1208825279&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]

	---NEW ON VIDEO
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0758784/]Starting Out in the Evening[/url]  -  (big thumbs) up  -  (big thumbs) up
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0464141/]The Orphanage[/url]  -  (mild) up - up

	---Phillips&#039; Three to See (favorite movies currently in theaters)
		3 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1047007/]Young @ Heart[/url]
		2 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0857191/]The Visitor[/url]
		1 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0800039/]Forgetting Sarah Marshall[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
Siskel & Ebert and Ebert & Roeper video reviews dating back to 1985 can be found at [url=http://www.atthemoviestv.com/]atthemoviestv.com[/url]
Free [url=http://www.apple.com/podcasting/ ]Podcasts[/url] of Ebert & Roeper are available at the [url=http://www.apple.com/itunes/]iTunes Music Store[/url]
